title: Chickpea and garden pea salad
ingredients: ['1 (400g) tin chickpeas, drained and rinsed', '1/4 onion, grated', '1/2 lemon, juiced', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '5 tablespoons olive oil', '100g (4 oz) frozen garden peas, thawed']
